text: The A16, also called L'Européenne (The European) in French, is an autoroute (motorway) in France. It goes between Paris and the border with Belgium near Ghyvelde. It goes through Amiens, Calais and Dunkirk. It is part of the European route E40. The autoroute is about long in total. ==Exits and junctions== Junction number & name Northbound exits Southbound exits 8 RN1, RN104, RD909, RD78 Montsoult, RN1, RN104, Attainville, Moisselles, RD301,
